name: Amanagi
description: Sin descripción

name: The Capybarrier
description: You are a capybara. Your freedom lies on the other side of your greatest obstacle. Despite your past efforts, you can not defeat the wall on your own. You must rally your zoomates to surpass The Capybarrier.

name: Solar Voltage
description: After a huge solar storm destroyed their ship and left them stranded, help Volt and her crewmates escape the dangerous planet filled with deadly robots and a mysterious AI.

name: Crossybara
description: Small-Leaf the Capybara lost the fruit he was going to bring to the hot spring to stack ontop of his head! can you help him scavenge for the lost fruit and save the day? Crossybara: Nonogram Slam! is a new take on the regular Nonogram/Picross puzzle, Instead of solving the puzzle to reveal a picture, you are solving to reveal the level. loads of enjoyable platforming gameplay with a side dish of brain-bamboozling puzzles!

name: Rinbo
description: Embark on an epic adventure of gliding and battling through mystical lands in RINBO, where discovery awaits at every turn!

name: Causality!
description: The game's primary objective is to kill every stick figure without having other stick figures witness the death.

name: Aurorae Equitas
description: Slightly over-the-hill capybaras Rubina and Ceferino, a pair of old acquaintances, meet up at a rental cabin near the end of the year for the Aurorae Equitas, a recurring natural event that happens once every few decades. They quickly realize that no one else from their social group is showing up, they try to make the best of an awkward social situation and reminisce on their tangentially shared history while sharing a warm fire and a calming hot spring.

name: Capybaradise
description:
Capybaradise is an endless 3D stacking game for mobile and web in which you have to stack as many capybaras as possible with the help of a friendly goose.

Await the right moment and tap on the screen to let the capybara land safely ontop!

name: Delta Strike
description: Gear up, soldier, and prepare for the ultimate FPS showdown in Delta Strike!

name: Synthetic Soul: Reset
description: Synthetic Soul: Reset is a remaster of our first game in the series, remade in our new engine. Discover the secret of your robot, and change the world.

name: Kinetic Breakthrough
description: Boost and grapple around a cyberpunk cityscape in Kinetic Breakthrough, a high-speed metroidvania. Use your momentum to break through windows, destroy drones, and confront the artificial intelligence that keeps the city under its control.

name: Dik Journey
description: An NSFW match-3 game for fabulous gay or bisexual gaymers, offering light-hearted entertainment and relaxation. Players progress through match-3 rounds, developing their power and skills to conquer handsome and hot guys within the game, engaging in NSFW interactions with them.

name: Tower of Doom VR
description: Like the eye of Sauron in the Lord of the Rings, the player stands atop a tall tower overlooking a vast landscape. As enemies march in from all directions, the player must cast spells using various hand-tracking poses to ensure their survival. interactive simulation/art-piece with unique controls.

name: Only Up: Skibidi
description: Only Up: Skibidi is an exciting multiplayer 3D platformer. Overcome challenging obstacles and climb higher and higher. Attention and focus will help you reach new heights, and this rule applies both in the game and in life.

name: Hard Time III
description: The toughest prison sim in the yard is back to serve its 3rd consecutive sentence - combining classic moments from the OG with the best aspects of 2D, while putting out a few hits of its own! Tackle crime from either side of the prison fence, while a larger world beyond it makes life worth living.

name: Meet the Rookie
description: Explore the small town of Kettle Rock as Detective Lupe, alongside their unlikely partner Sheriff Misra, to solve the case of a mysterious Winery. But things are not as they seem, as something much more sinister lies behind the history of this town.

name: Broke in Isekai
description: Broke and down on your luck, you enter a portal to another world, only to find out that your fortunes there aren't any better. Broke in another world, you have to find a way to survive in a corrupt city. At least there are beautiful women of various fantastical races to build relationships with.

name: Wing Haven
description: Wing Haven is a relaxing idle game about building cozy bird sanctuaries. Collect rare and exotic feathered friends, give them plant shelter, and watch them grow in real-time! Progress from a basic enclosure to a beautiful nature preserve in old-growth forest, desert oasis, or wetland climates!

name: Ballad of Angels
description: Collect power-ups, items, and gear to survive against others in this 2D top-down online pvp arena battler. Hone your skills and learn the tech involved with three combat styles, dashing, jumping, blocking, redirecting, and abilities. Collect power-ups to determine your unique build for the game.

name: Fortress Forge
description: As a mighty commander, you'll oversee the defense of your base and use weaponry to repel the oncoming hordes. Harness the unique properties of various soldiers and weapons to land devastating blows to the enemy!

name: TinkerTech
description: TinkerTech is a game that allows players to design, construct and showcase their unique builds made of customizable blocks. Race, battle or socialize with your creations in multiplayer rooms.

name: MSCR
description: Control EMET, a highly advanced Combat Android produced by YAD, a Military Technologies company working for the government, the android was made for tyrannical purposes, but thanks to a mysterious event, your mission now is to bring justice to the world

name: Hole
description: Casual & Hard FPS. Be careful with jam.

name: Veil Runners
description: Veil Runners is an action roguelite arena auto-shooter where you fight through waves of creatures to reach the next planet in search of the source. Level up, loot, buy randomly generated items and more to upgrade your character and units into an awesome and game-breaking build.

name: Pure Blood
description: "Pure Blood" is an Open World MORPG that tells the story of those who had to flee the invaded kingdom to find their throne again, and you can feel the "taste of hand" of Soul-Like through easy manipulation.

name: Stick Infinite Kingdom
description: Master strategic gameplay as you build, train, and upgrade units to protect your statue and king. Switch between leaders, unlock chests, and compete on the leaderboard. With stunning visuals, diverse zombies, and easy controls, it's an epic battle for survival!

name: Zalera Spark
description: Zalera spark is a dynamic boss fight game set in a cute magical fantasy world, where you can forge friendships with your various opponents. Adapt by choosing or removing skills of your choice, and find your own way to fight !

name: Pinball Hero
description: In this game the pinball IS the hero! Ascend from the Goblin Caves, to the Perilous Plains and defeat the evil wizard in the Hallowed Castle to reclaim your adventurer spirit! Battle slimes, skeletons, goblins, ghouls, and other fantasy creatures in the retro-inspired reimagining of Pinball.

name: Collapse
description: Experience intense 5v5 online FPS action in our modern take on Promod. Battle in destructible environments, demanding strategic adaptation. Perfect for both veterans and newcomers, gear up for high-octane fun and fierce competition!

name: Hentai Fox
description: Hentai Fox is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Star-Wired
description: Repair the circuitry of your Starship and clear out the intrusive programs in a cute and casual puzzle game. Plug in cables, activate moving objects, and dodge malicious entities on your quest for success!

The human roads and messy lawns are at a strange duality with the rural wetlands the capybara belongs to.

As more and more houses are constructed on wetlands in Argentina, capybaras are being driven from their homes and have found themselves living in peoples lawns. Trawl though the streets to find the woods, and follow the trail downstream towards the wetlands that are safe and full of friends.

description: Capy Island is a party game where players, who are capybaras, play minigames on an island to collect hats. These hats will give them a step up in the final showdown where they will all battle it out. The capybara with the most hats wins!

Venturing through mysterious worlds created by a mysterious group of antagonists known as, "The Mauve," Atabi and his friends must unlock their true potentials and go through the task of understanding the true intentions of one-another in their misfit group in order to restore balance to the world and merge split realities caused by an unknown force in order to take over the world.

name: The Digital Asset Inquisition
description:
A recent data leak of highly valuable and confidential files has prompted your clients to hire independent contractors to investigate, suspecting the leak to have originated internally. They have reason to believe one of the asset managers may be responsible for the breach.

This individual has not checked in recently, but you have triangulated their last known location to a space hotel on the fringe of the galaxial terminal, where it is suspected they plan to make their escape.

Your mission is to infiltrate the hotel and recover evidence of their involvement in the data leak by
a) retrieving their suitcase for evidence and
b) obtaining the target's brainbox for analysis
Further details are on the chalkboard, and be sure to check your notebook.

Dive into the colorful world of Color Dodge, the exciting arcade game that challenges your reflexes and reaction speed. Test your skills and quick thinking as you jump your ball through dynamic, color-changing walls.

Are you ready to experience the ultimate color marathon? Then download Color Dodge now and become the master of colors!

name: Meteo Planet
description:
Meteo Planet is a fast-paced one-button game.

Your goal is to collect as many coins as you can without getting caught by a meteorite. Avoid meteorites while rotating around the planet's axis. The closer the coin is to the meteorite, the more points it brings, but be careful not to get hit by the meteorite itself.

name: Microwave Story
description: Experience some little heartwarming stories in this little Playdate microwave simulator. In this game, you can choose different foods, crank the Playdate, and listen to what the food has to say for themselves...

name: Cast Away: The Oddysee
description: "Cast Away - The Oddysee" is an RPG Maker XP game developed by TheLuigiplayer and LamaZ Game Studio (formerly JS RPG's), which has been in development since 2011. The game is based on the concept of a classic dungeon crawler and follows the story of the sailor "John Maynard," who is named after the ballad by Theodor Fontane. John finds himself stranded on what initially appears to be a deserted island. However, events soon start to unfold, revealing what mysterious occurrences are taking place on that island!

name: You're Under Arrest
description: Taiho Shichau zo is a police-themed adventure base on the manga and anime with the same title. The player takes on a role of a 24-year old rookie police officer who just graduated. The game starts with you coming to your new place at work, and the moment you arrive, a small incident occurs and you get misunderstood for a thief. After situation gets resolved, you get introduced into your new place of work and meet your colleagues, among others the two heroines from manga and anime TV series, Natsumi Tsujimoto and Miyuki Kobayakawa. The game consists of two gameplay elements. Adventure mode which resembles a typical visual novel style with fully voiced dialogues for all but the main character, and animated portraits of characters currently speaking, as well as action choices during dialogues. Patrol mode features a patrol map of town where the player, along with Natsumi and Miyuki, is performing routine patrol work which may trigger an event scene or one of the mini-games. The points are also awarded for various different elements during patrol work.

name: Everhaven
description:
Everhaven (Working title: Project Dragon) was a cozy sandbox survival crafting multiplayer RPG- a buildable world made of blocks inspired by Minecraft filled with fantasy characters and quests inspired by Breath of the Wild.

This title was abruptly cancelled in the final stages of development and weeks before it's scheduled reveal and Early Access launch by Phoenix Labs's new owner Forte (a blockchain company that recently purchased the studio), resulting in mass studio layoffs.

name: Dino Shift
description: In this game you help the dino collect the blocks. You can get them only if you have the same colour as they. You just have to change your colour and they are yours. But it will not always be very easy, find out for yourself.

name: Mechenosets
description: A game based on the movie “Mechenosets” ("The Sword Bearer"). This is a drama about how society makes a monster out of a human being, about love and hate, capable of turning fragile flesh into steel. In the role of the main character of the movie you will have to go through all the iconic locations of the movie and fight with numerous opponents. The game repeats and in a way complements the plot of the movie, turning the combination of game and movie into a unique experience for the player and the viewer.

name: Before the Moon
description:
A short walking simulator.

Inspired by old dreams and looking at the Moon.

name: Jiggraph
description: A puzzle game about shaking hands

name: Thoom
description:
This game title has been an inside joke in community for a while, but it's finally here. Behold! The First First-person shooter game in thumby ... Thoom.

This is a demake version Doom written in MicoPython, with raycasting pseudo-3D and sprite scaling (for upscale only, it looks unrecognizable when downscale).As a proof of concept, there is only one level, filled with Demons and Imps, and locked doors requiring key card to open, and last but not least a small bossfight.

Hope you enjoy this short game. And hope you use this project to create something more fun. (sorry for ugly codes)

name: Indoor Haul
description: In Indoor Haul, you once again find yourself at an abandoned indoor mall. Using your trusty shopping cart, grab as many valuables as you can - but BEWARE! The heavier your cart gets, the harder it is to push! Try to get a high score in the 2-Minute, 5-Minute, and Free Play modes!

description: This updated and upgraded version of the popular E-flite Cherokee 1.3m is a Smarter tribute to the general aviation classic that features a variety of scale details and functional features including lights, flaps, a full-flying stabilator, and more.

name: RealFlight Evolution: Triple Tree Float Flight Line

name: H.E.N.T.A.L.K.E.R.
description: Forget about the rules, there are none here. Just you, your weapon and the endless, ominous wastelands waiting for you to plunge into them. So, are you ready to become a predator among predators? Then welcome to H.E.N.T.A.L.K.E.R.. It will hurt, but damn it will be fun!

Can you uncover the dark secrets lurking within the Pine Barrens?

name: Way of the Hunter: Outfits Pack
description: The Outfits Pack contains one original costume for each character - River, April, Wallace, Jackie and Malachi, usable in Free Hunt and Multiplayer mode.

name: H.I.v.C.A.: Human Intelligence vs Computer Algorithm
description: "H.I.v.C.A." is a strategic game where every choice matters. Gather resources, develop technologies, and strategically place your forces to ensure victory over opponents. There is no room for a draw in this game - only one can become the absolute ruler of the new world.

name: American Truck Simulator: Sports Paint Jobs Pack
description: Calling all Sports Fans! We are introducing the Sports Paint Job Pack for American Truck Simulator. Decorate your truck with these beautiful American sports-themed paint jobs. From the court to the rink, they will have your truck looking like a heavyweight champion in no time!

name: DNA: Season 2 - Episode 4
description: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: DNA: Final Episode - Part 1
description: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: DNA 1: Finale
description: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: DNA: Final Episode - Part 2
description: The DNA action rpg franchise is created by a solo dev as an episodic side scrolling action hack and slash beat em up, story-driven 2d anime that welcomes the world into the DNA universe. You play as the main character Leo to find his true purpose in life. Thus begins the fascinating story of DNA!

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 16 - Collectors Edition
description: A family friendly Hidden Object Game set in a National Park

name: Fernbus Simulator: Interlink HD
description: Welcome to the era of the Interlink HD, a masterpiece for passenger transportation! Expand your fleet with 2 new variants of the Interlink HD and experience the future of travel.

name: Battle Axe & Final Vendetta Bundle
description: Battle Axe: Battle Axe is an arcade top-down hack & slash featuring high-quality visuals created by veteran pixel artist Henk Nieborg, true to form game mechanics, and music from the legendary VGM composer Manami Matsumae – retro gamers rejoice!

name: Beyond Horizon: The Astral Expedition
description: Awaken in a surreal realm of giant insects and blurred reality. Guided by a companion, master movement, customize your outfit, and uncover your past. Complete missions to rebuild the city and pursue a mystical orb to return to reality. Will you escape or remain captivated by the astral world?

name: Hagalegacy
description: Peel, jump, swap - Embark on a grand sticky adventure in "Hagalegacy" with Perin! Help Perin, the protagonist of this story, travel a world plunged into stickery-madness brought upon a witch's mischief in a puzzle-action game depicting their legacy.

name: Naribikimura
description: Naribiki Village is a first-person, single-player exploration horror game. The focus is on exploring the uncharted village of Naribiki, where uncovering clues will reveal the truth about what happened there.

name: For the Glory of Gods TCG
description: Alternative online turn-based trading card game, that allows you unlimited deck-building options. Three different game modes, including Solo, Gauntlet, and Multiplayer to choose from! Earn cards, packs, and coins, and try to stay on top of the leaderboards For the Glory of Gods.

name: Night Driver
description: Night Driver - 3D car game in which you will drive at night through dark alleys!

name: Magic Academy
description: The Magic Academy's gates are open, your acceptance letter in hand. Adventure, mystery, and endless exploration await within.

name: Burn
description: Burn is a short and replayable visual novel, where you play Nina BURN, the biggest pop star in the world at the turning point of her career. Will you change pop music? Will you become a monster?

name: Tiny Kingdoms
description: Tiny Kingdoms is a peaceful building strategy and puzzle game where you build an enchanting and ever-expanding kingdom by placing tiles on a hexagonal grid. Explore diverse, vibrant biomes, discover and unlock new tiles, and complete quests to bring your world to life!

name: Rebound Rivals
description: Blast into action with your trusty air cannon with gameplay inspired by Air Hockey and additions like traps and power-ups. Play with your friends in the classic game or go all out in the destructive chaos mode where you have more than your opponent to worry about.

name: Don't Trust
description: Don't Trust is a multiplayer horror game about deception. There are a group of survivors on a military base, and one of the survivors is secretly infected. The infected can transform into the survivor form to trick the other players.

name: Heroglobin: Monster Hospital
description: Hazel Harkin, a haematology patient, is struggling with life in hospital. One day they uncover a conspiracy: the hospital is being run by cultists + their monster army! join forces with other patients + fight hordes of monsters to save the world!

name: CPA: Reports Bousy
description: Experience the constant fear and loneliness surrounded by the decrepit old walls of an abandoned house with a tragic story, while feeling the true horror of being hunted by a creature created from a strong friendship. Try to survive and scape the house!

name: Slot Gun
description: Slot Gun is a satisfying deckbuilding slot-machine game where you face off against several opponents to control the board. It is a blend of luck and skill where timing is key and dopamine is everywhere.

name: Motu
description: A minimalist 1v1 island battle game, mixing real-time resource collection and combat with turn-based tactics.

name: Kingdoms of Lost Valleys
description: First in the series will be a turn-based multiplayer Trading Card Game where players can collect, buy, sell, customize, trade, and rent warriors and all this will happen in the game environment.

name: Stickman Adventure
description: Enter a world where honor weighs more than gold, and every quarrel is decided by the sword. In Stickman Adventure, you become a legendary hero, alone with a large army where only the strongest and smartest survive. Choose the path to glory and show the world that you are a true warrior.

name: Vedmaak
description: Vedmaak is an action RPG with Turn-Based Combat centered around battling foes and gathering valuable loot. Vedmaaks, elite warriors adept in melee combat, marksmanship, and practical magic, are sought for missions surpassing the abilities of ordinary warriors.

name: Vision Ghost 2
description: This case takes us to a large mansion located deep in the mountains. In this small world almost cut off from the outside, the main leadership of a large company resides. They harbor secrets unknown to outsiders, which will gradually be revealed due to the occurrence of an accidental incident...

name: RC: Car Maniacs
description: RC:CM is a fascinating arcade simulator of radio-controlled cars that will allow you to plunge into the world of children's fantasies by driving radio-controlled cars: rally, drift, high-speed and other types of cars! Race with your friends! Speed, adrenaline and excitement await you!

name: Cuprum2929
description: After waking up disoriented near the sea, a young kid must navigate through an enigmatic city controlled by AI screens, searching for their missing dog, Pythagora. Solve intricate puzzles housed in unique locations and unravel the secrets of this advanced island and reunite with your companion.

name: Hidden Square
description: Hidden Square can be both easy and tricky. With its minimalistic design, the game presents a unique challenge of uncovering hidden squares.

name: Call to Strike
description: Call to Strike is a Top-Down Helicopter-Based Shooter. Pilot the world’s most lethal aircraft in multiple countries to search, destroy, rescue, and survive.

name: Hentai Senpai: Konbini no Shirigaru Onna
description: Dive into the tantalizing world of Hentai Senpai: Konbini no Shirigaru Onna! Solve steamy puzzles and meet 52 alluring Shirigaru Onna. Enjoy stunning 5K visuals, a sensual gallery, and a chill lofi soundtrack. Unlock and uncover the sensual secrets of the Shirigaru Onna! 🧩

name: Magic Patrol Envoy
description: In the face of many monsters, the best way is to build a strong piece of equipment.

name: Project Starcrash
description: Use your powerful punches to defeat alien invaders in this 2.5D platformer.

name: Sticks Together: The Wishing Well
description: A math-powered adventure awaits! Join the friends on a quest for The Wishing Well. Conquer foes in 2D turn-based combats where your calculation skills are the key to victory. Sharpen your mind by solving math puzzles in a charming world brought to life with a classic cartoon art style!

name: Stop, Pawssport Check
description: Stop, Pawssport Check is a fun couch co-op simulation game. Bring your friends and take your place at the border crossings to maintain order and security. Be on the lookout for false documents, suspicious passengers or even smuggling, you can't let anything slip through.. or can you?

name: Footsy
description: Footsy is a chaotic multiplayer soccer party game set inside grandma's house! Smash furniture, shatter bottles, and tumble TVs as you compete in wild, goal-scoring action. Customize your characters, challenge your friends, and embrace the crazy destruction in every room!

name: Srogue
description: Srogue is a snake roguelite where you play as a snake and defeat enemies in order to feast and grow. Unlock new ways to play by gaining experience and choosing items to alter your snake. The goal is to survive as long as possible.

name: Powerplay
description: Powerplay is an RTS with a focus on resources and industry. Create supply chains, transport, and explore in this thrilling base builder. Grow into a powerful industrial nation, but don't spread too thin! Resources are finite and "the others" can reclaim what is theirs at any time.

name: Forest Walk
description: Forest Walk is a game about influencing characters met through dialogue, actions, or items obtained. With branching dialogue paths and outcomes, you can choose to help or ruin those around you as you climb to the top of the mountain.

name: Vs. Self
description: Tyoma leads a double life... a life of crime and deception. His carefully crafted life is thrown into shambles when he creates an unexpected bond with a gas station customer.

name: Sex Inspector
description: Sex Inspector is a 18+ visual novel where every sultry alley and shadowy figure could lead to thrilling encounters or chilling discoveries. Think you can handle the heat?

name: Cos-249
description: Welcome to your new job. You will be viewing a recording of COS-249. The test subject's is E-376 he will be recording his full experience in the room.The room is full of anomalous objects and entities. The only objective is to stay alive.But don't worry there is cake at the end.

name: Night of The Abattoir Man
description: The story of Michael D'Amato, a young 23-year-old man who flies to New York with the intention of starring in his uncle's new horror movie. However, he finds himself in a real-life horror scenario as he becomes the target of a 10-foot-tall maniac known as the Abattoir Man.

name: UnLoop
description: You are trapped in a time loop anomaly aboard a space station while on a secret spy mission. Team up with your past copies to break free in UnLoop, an atompunk VR adventure.

name: Flip & Fit
description: Flip & Fit is a physics-based party game for 1-4 players. Pick up and play through the coop puzzle game show on a clock! Will you make it all the way to the show finale?

name: Gensokyo: Presumption of Guilt - Pansies Before Dawn
description: An ancient village, once sealed by yokais for a millennium, is now plagued by a series of bizarre yokai murders. Follow the protagonist as they delve into the investigation, unravelling the mysteries submerged in the history.

name: The Catalyst Acolyte Tower Defense
description: Defend the Catalyst Crystal against adorable yet menacing bugs in The Catalyst Acolyte. Strategically construct defenses in handcrafted levels, aided by helpful items every 10 waves. Engaging gameplay and charming visuals make for an addictive tower defense adventure.

name: Manda: Mario and Ana
description: This is my first game. This is a game that can be played by yourself or in pairs. You can control Mario to jump, run, and control Ana to shoot, heal Mario, or clear obstacles. Survive as much as possible in a random world to get higher scores.

name: Times of Survival
description: A top-down action-rpg survival game where you face the threat of zombies alone or in co-op and expand the survival zone of humanity. Explore a ruined city, gather supplies and craft powerful weapons. Support human settlements, reclaim territory and win the war against the zombie hordes.

name: Idle Casino Empire
description: A casual casino themed idle game with a lot of replayability. Attract and cynically exploit your customers to expand your casino empire globally and beyond.

name: Persecution: The Elevator
description: Persecution - The Elevator is a first-person psychological thriller. Explore an ordinary apartment in a new building, where one night strange things begin to happen.

name: Dojo City
description: Dojo City is a 3D action video game set in a reimagined, present-day New York City that is overrun by out-of-control martial arts dojos.

name: Gachi Feasting
description: Gachi Feasting is a hardcore action puzzle game. You will have to connect wrestlers into chain using their arms and other naughty parts. Will you be able to withstand this gachi world of falling men and their mighty fists?

name: 7Years
description: 7Years is a first-person, story-based horror game. Traverse open-world maps as you investigate for clues, solve puzzles, uncover mysteries and elude unique demonic enemies, each created to trigger a specific fear and keep you from your only mission: survive and save your wife.

name: Cross Brawl
description: Embark on thrilling battles solo or with friends in our fast-paced game! Unlock a plethora of weapons, skills, and gadgets. Collect stunning skins to stand out. Explore mysterious locations and engage in epic battles like never before!

name: Oryks
description: 2D platform game inspired by the Halloween atmosphere like in Tim Burton's films. In the game, we conduct conversations, solve investigations, move left and right, jump and shoot to defeat enemies, we also interact with the environment. We also make decisions that affect the course of the mission.

name: Star Shogun
description: Kohanga Shogun is a first person sci-fi colony building game with economy management and vehicle combat. We've got a touch of 4X, a touch of RTS, and lots and lots of mech on mech action!

name: Lalli
description: Lalli tells the tale of a Finnish folk hero and freedom fighter. In 1240, Finland is invaded by the neighboring Swedish Kingdom, aiming to convert the tribes to Christianity by force. This is when a regular woodsman is forced to adapt into a warrior - and a legend, remembered centuries later.

name: Rim: Soul Jar
description: RIM: Soul Jar is a hack and slash roguelite set in a world where medieval and futuristic elements mix. Become a warrior who has fallen into the past and embark on a journey to save the future with the Soul Jar. Cleanse dungeons of enemies and bosses, and set out to break the cycle of RIM.

name: Grand Fantasia: Origin
description: New engine, New gameplay, New adventure, the classic MMORPG 《Grand Fantasia：ORIGIN》technological innovation, reigniting the heart of adventure, and composing a new chapter of the fantasy World with Sprites.

name: Colorful Ghost
description: Embark on a puzzling adventure in COLORFUL GHOSTS! Guide ghosts through challenges where candies change their colors, allowing them to blend with others. Overcome obstacles with logic. With ColorAdd accessibility features, easily identify colors. Can you solve these spectral puzzles?

name: Floating World
description: 【Survival】|【Building】|【Sandbox】 Start with just a raft, the rest is up to you!

name: Tank Hunter
description: Wasteland sci-fi style light meat pigeon tank shooting game

name: The Protagonish
description: An adventure game, where you don't control the adventurer. Play the side characters in a medieval village, and decide to help or hinder the adventurer in their mysterious quest.

name: Forgotten Red Fog
description: Forgotten Red Fog is a turn based JRPG with the pinch of the perfect timing for certain battle skills. The game's focus is the linear story, the characters and the cruel, racist world.

name: Judofuri
description: You only need one button to compete in this fruity party game! Press it, squeeze it & mash it in a series of silly mini-games for 2 to 9 players and claim your spot as the juiciest fruit of ‘em all!

name: Beach Ping Pong Babes VR
description: This is a summer -filled VR table tennis game, allowing players to feel the charm of beach table tennis on the hot summer day. The background of the game is set on a beautiful and golden beach. The waves patted the shore gently, giving a quiet and comfortable feeling.

name: Oil and Sand
description: An exciting tower defense game where you have to defend your island from the invasion of enemy forces. Your task is to build and upgrade towers to repel waves of attacking enemies.

name: The Fight: Aftermath
description: Embark on a thrilling odyssey through a world torn apart by catastrophe. As a lone survivor, navigate treacherous terrain, scavenge for essentials, and confront the horrors of the apocalypse. Will you overcome adversity and rebuild civilization, or succumb to the chaos of the wasteland?

name: Death Plunder
description: Death Plunder is a 2D pixel platen survival game,You'll play as a mortal who risks everything for a treasure,Deep into the quarantined zombie island,plunder all kinds of loot and supplies To ensure survival.

name: Sex Industry XXX
description: Sex Industry XXX is a unique game that combines elements of visual novel and clicker, allowing you to immerse yourself in the world of the adult film industry.

name: Pocket Robots
description: Program your robot in real-time to fight in a nervous 2D fighting game !

name: Warband Survivors
description: A unique mixture of vehicular combat and a wide selection of awesome characters, deploy into big map of an action packed events and objectives.

name: The Song of Awakening
description: The Song of Awakening is a 2D action-platformer where you play as a bard with the power to create magic through music. Explore a world once ruled by the Lyramancers, wielders of music-magic, who were extinguished by a mad king. Defeat the malevolent god of silence and restore harmony to the world.

name: Endless Onslaught
description: Fight hordes of zombies whilst upgrading your weapons and buying effects in the shop. Carefully make your way around the map, picking up ammo, sneaking around zombies and collecting precious potions. Choose from 4 unique maps, with different shops and zombie types.

name: Senile Zombies
description: Senile Zombies is a magic-themed zombie survival shooter that can be played alone or in co-operative multiplayer. Shoot your way through multiple rounds of increasingly strong enemies, while upgrading your own powers to keep up.

name: Encounters
description: Encounters is an open-world, Exploration game about hunting for aliens and cryptids

name: Satan
description: Experience the thrill of retro boomer shooters in this action-packed game where you'll battle hordes of demons and face the ultimate challenge: Satan himself. Relive the glory days of classic shooters with intense gameplay, a variety of weapons, and relentless enemies.

name: Fast Running
description: Fast running, challenge the limits.

name: AngelGaze
description: 90s EGA Point and Click adventure

name: Kelder
description: Trapped in a sinister post-Soviet basement, uncover the truth behind dark experiments and eerie anomalies. Solve puzzles, find keys, and survive against terrifying entities as you explore this atmospheric survival horror. Can you escape the depths of the Kelder?

name: SuperHyperHappyGame
description: [3D first person runner game]Run through aiming for the goal!

name: Amusia
description: Play as Lambert, who stumbles across Cadenzia, a world formed by Classical Music, and aims to help Satan destroy this world.

name: Astraia Land
description: Astraia is an innovative game that combines equipment building, dungeon challenge, platform jumping and LAN team up online. The game requires a certain amount of maneuverability, players need to sprint, jump, and avoid enemy skills and barrage.

name: Exanimate
description: Exanimate is a 1-4 player co-op survival game where you face off against never-ending legions of Zeds and their innumerable variations in a valiant attempt to escape with your lives, your riches and your highest possible scores! How long can you hold out against the Exanimate?

name: Crazy World of Caleb: Level 1 to 7
description: Experience the start of Caleb's difficult journey. For more get Crazy World of Caleb.

name: My New Memories: The Beginning
description: My New Memories: The Beginning tells you the story of My New Memories before you reunited with Anna and started a family. Find out how the MC turned out to be the man you know from the main game - The loving and caring husband and the protective and wonderful father!

name: A Game of Gods: Infinium
description: Discover a new adventure with every playthrough in this unique fantasy RPG. Every choice matters as you uncover what secrets Infinium is hiding. Will you become a daring adventurer or a rich mogul?

name: Pig Rush
description: "Pig Rush" is a maze adventure game set in a deep forest. In this game, you guide a brave little wild boar named Argan. Argan will evade traps, defeat enemies, and keep moving forward to find the answers needed to save his tribe.

name: Drone 'em All
description: Drone 'em All is a cartoonish arcade rogue-like with a pinch of satire. Fly your drone, kill nasty Zorks and free the invaded country of Braveland. Upgrade drones, eliminate mini bosses and explore the dramatic stories of local residents.

name: Dominance Chess-like
description: Turn-based strategy game where the players use their game pieces to gain control of the fields of a chess board one move at a time.

name: Skill Random Defense
description: - Game Description Combine awesome skills to win against waves of enemies! Skill Random Defense is a casual defense game that combines 60 skills to block enemies. Combine the optimal skills using the skills you have.

name: Wobbly Heights
description: Enter a world where blocks defy norms! Stack, grow, shrink, and solidify blocks in a puzzle game that's all about strategy and creativity to make the tallest tower possible as demands keep rising. How tall will your tower become?

name: WASDJK
description: Complete a adventure story in this maze with only operation hints.

name: Puzzled Hive
description: Puzzled Hive is a simple, beehive based puzzle game in which you play as Meo and help him explore this strange place in search of his answers.

name: Crowded. Followed.
description: You have the briefcase. Now it's after you. It's not going to stop. Be careful—it may take the form of someone else. A short horror game by NIGHT DIAL.

name: Darkwater
description: A cooperative survival horror game where you take command of a submarine trapped under the ice of an alien planet.

name: Infinite Void
description: Embark on an endless cosmic odyssey in Infinite Void! Master retro-inspired space shoot 'em up gameplay with procedurally generated universes, dynamic upgrades, & simple controls. Every run offers a unique challenge. Will you conquer the "Infinite Void" or succumb to its celestial challenges?

name: Oroboro
description: Explore an open world and fight foes for loot and resources in a 2D side-scroller action RPG. Then return and share with your friendly NPCs, manage relationships, gossip, progress skills, and rebuild the destroyed town.

name: No-Hi
description: No-Hi is a parkour platformer, combo your moves to get fast and cut your way with momentum! Explore the map the way you want, never being lost. Face unique bosses with gracious movements. Sinergize itens to make your own gameplay style.

name: Red Planet Rampart
description: You are deployed to the desolate red planet to reforge humanity's hope. With no hospitable atmosphere, no nurturing water sources, only relentless storms, unknown alien creatures, you must use wit and determination to survive on this alien land and build a Mars base of your own.

name: Golden Ball
description: Playing this game will give you the experience of feeling like a child and competing in a little athletic competition. You may also learn to understand a little more about how molecules feel. If you are looking for a game for a change of pace from other games, try this one.

name: Lost Girl Platformer
description: Lost Girl Platformer is a thrilling 2D platform game where you play as a courageous girl. Your task is to jump from platform to platform to survive and escape. But be careful: time is limited, and every jump must be precise!

name: Legends of The Internet
description: Legends Of The Internet is an exhilarating card video game that transports players into the dynamic and captivating realm of cyberspace. Set in a fantastical digital universe, the game combines elements of strategy, luck, and storytelling to create an immersive gaming experience unlike any other.

name: I Did It All For The Cookie!
description: You are hanging out at a festive Christmas party when your eyes discover the most perfect Christmas confectionery ever! You must have it!... but someone already has it! What will you be willing to do, to get your Christmas wish?

name: Mega Man ZX Prequel
description: Rockman ZX Prequel is a Mega Man ZX fangame created by the Chinese group Rockman Lab, set between the events of the Mega Man Zero and Mega Man ZX series. Unlike the ZX series, there are only two playable Biometals.

name: Chemist Wanted
description: Chemist Wanted is a crafting game with a difference! In this lab simulator, you use practical chemistry to make compounds and sell them. Set up your equipment, run the experiments and create your products. But be careful who you cut deals with - you might get more than you bargained for!

name: Sombra
description: Sombra is a 2D platform video game with a pixel art style where you have to guide a cat to the exit of the cave it has fallen into, with the only option of clicking a button to perform different actions.Help this scared little kitty find her way back home.

name: Little Fish Swims On
description: Little Fish Swims is a relaxing and enjoyable idle game with a casual simulated fish tank located at the top of the screen. There are over a thousand types of fish in the game, and you can customize your own fish tank and background skin style.

name: Not a Masterpıece
description: Not a Masterpiece invites players on a whimsical journey through a vibrant cartoon world, where nothing is quite as it seems

name: Florist Business Simulator
description: Bring flowers from nature to venues in Florist Business Simulator. Develop your business by gathering flowers, making stunning arrangements, and decorating venues to delight your customers with beautiful spaces.

name: Falco Totem Destroyer
description: A fun physics puzzle!

name: Rescue Team: Clouded Mind
description: The world faces a brand-new threat as a dangerous cult spreads its influence. People begin to betray their free will and follow the cults orders, as reports flood in from various locations worldwide, it's down to the Rescue Team to save humanity once again!

name: Medieval Businessman
description: Welcome to the Empty Patch of Land. Can you create your own beautiful kingdom here? In this strategy in real time you can build farms, taverns, barracks, and more.

name: Project Phoenix
description: The player finds himself in an abandoned Soviet bunker, built at the height of the Cold War. The protagonist is a stalker, a hunter for artifacts and secrets of the past. He entered the bunker, attracted by legends of secret experiments and the mysterious disappearance of all personnel.

name: Verve
description: Welcome to Verve. You are RT-6, a member of Liminal Leap's highly-trained professional rescuing team. You are tasked to find the location of a small group of research scientists who sent out a high-level distress call from deep within the void of Verve. Good luck, the Verve is unforgiving.

name: Shattered Melodies
description: Slash and shred your way through the vibrant, musical world of Soronos. Summon all your rhythm, dexterity, and puzzle solving chops to beat down the fool that nabbed your little sister!

name: Light: Die to Survive
description: Explore a haunted house, shadowy forests, and ominous roads with a flashlight in "Light - Die to Survive," a spine-chilling horror game. Solve random, terrifying paranormal mysteries in a night-shrouded environment. Experience dynamic horror, immersive sound effects, and mystery solving. Can you escape the darkness?

name: Chronal Stasis
description: Travel to the past and blast your way through to save the timeline in Chronal Stasis, a 2.5D time-traveling platformer-esque game that combines classic run and gun elements with time-based abilities. Join Henry as he fights to save his family and fix the timeline. Is it really that simple though?

name: Fantasy TD Battles
description: Competitive, multiplayer Tower Defense with RPG elements. Upgrade your towers, cast abilities, choose your talents, and outlast your opponents against waves of enemies. May the best strategy win!

name: Evil Dark
description: Keep the lights on until dawn breaks—or risk becoming prey to what lurks in the darkness.

name: Combat Evolved 2D
description: Unleash Your Inner Warrior in a Fast-Paced Top-Down 2D PvP Extravaganza! Strategy meets skill in intense player-versus-player combat! Master your hero, outsmart your opponents, and rise to the top in this vibrant, action-packed battleground.

name: Penalty Challenge
description: Embark on an exhilarating journey with Penalty Challenge, the definitive 11-meter shot simulator crafted for those passionate about elevating their football abilities.

name: Cucumber
description: Cucumber is a never before seen jump Game, in which you jump with a cucumber! Get a random cucumber every 3 hours and grow your fantastic cucumber collection!

name: I Got Isekai'd Into a Shmup
description: I Got Isekai'd into a Shmup is a vertical shoot'em up game inspired by the best games of the 90s genre, while adding exciting features and local co-op for up to 4 players.

name: Shoot Shoot Cowboy!
description: Hey Cowboy, straighten your hat!

name: Virtual Fight World
description: A 3d multiplayer party game where you can run around with friends, change your outfit or skin tone; fight, swim, do fun activities like dancing, going on a waterslide or performing in a strip club. Plus perform dozens of fight moves!

name: Flappy Alien
description: Prepare for an intergalactic adventure in Flappy Alien! Navigate your UFO through space, dodge obstacles, and aim for the highest score.

name: Cube
description: Enter the world of CUBE: simple yet sophisticated. Master challenging jumps in a hostile environment where movement only occurs mid-air. Collect cubes, boost your score, and enjoy this relaxing, immersive game.

name: Furriend
description: Help the lonely mage to spawn lots of cute Paw-friends! Furriend is a 2.5D isometric puzzle games that combines connect the dot + merge mechanics.

name: Street Flicker
description: The Ultimate PVP/PVE Puzzle Fighter! Challenge the world in this quick-play skill-based game. Or join Matcha Bee in a quirky single player story mode and experience the mean Streets of Canaan! #NoPayToWin

name: Marketplace
description: Marketplace is an idle/clicker Game, in which your score increases! Everytime score increases there is a chance for you to obtain an item from a Marketplace! Come and join us on our Discord, making marketplace a richer place!

name: Bean
description: Welcome to Bean, the clicker game more addictive than cat videos! Click your way to bean glory, gathering beans faster than you can say "bean counter." Unlock mysterious inventory drops with golden beans, magic beans, or baked beans. Dive in and may the beans be ever in your flavor!

name: Run, Vivian Run
description: Vivian starts running to change her fate――― A simple and rhythmic 2D side-scrolling action game. Match the correct actions to the music as you race through a collapsing fantasy world. Currently, only Stage 1 is available in this early access version.

name: Pollen
description: Immerse yourself in a thrilling maze escape game where your sense is limited, and danger lurks around every corner. Can you outsmart everyone and find your way out?

name: Dogs
description: Dogs is a relaxing and fun game where you click on adorable dogs to earn points. Featuring a variety of cute dog breeds, simple gameplay, and charming visuals, it's perfect for dog lovers and players of all ages.

name: Conflict 2: Blitz
description: Traditional RTS real-time strategy, from the beginning of high school to now, Conflict 1, Conflict 2 Western Front, Conflict 2 Blitz. In general, a person development, overall simple, please forgive me.

name: Pineapple
description: Click the Pineapple and collect them all!

name: Carrot Paradise
description: You are a rabbit! Play with the farmer and bring back lots of carrots to the nest!

name: Solar Sweets
description: A multiplayer kitchen-simulator game where you can compete with your friends to find how who is the better chef! Create 10+ different types of pastries including: Waffles, Croissants, Pancakes and more!

name: Prison of Nightmare
description: Prison of Nightmare is a first-person psychological horror game that immerses players in a haunting and oppressive atmosphere. The game revolves around an ancient dark entity, a malevolent spirit that invades the protagonist's dreams, aiming to terrorize and eventually capture their soul.

name: Treasure Hunter: Idle RPG
description: Let your team kill the bad guys and gather all sorts of loot for you to play with

name: Spin or Die
description: Spin or Die is an action-packed game that puts you in control of a character armed with a heavy weapon strapped to his arm.

name: Bitsy Bits: The Secret of Magic
description: Bitsy Bits: The Secret of Magic Bounce your way through this magical action filled adventure as you wield dozens of magic to bounce away characters through colorful environments

name: Manatee

name: AceForce 2
description:
AceForce 2 is a 5v5 multi-role PvP mobile shooter game developed by Tencent's Morefun Studios. Powered by Unreal Engine 4, AceForce 2 offers exhilarating tactical combat experiences!

The game pushes the boundaries of what can be achieved on mobile, offering unparalleled game mechanics and ultimate gaming experiences. With original map designs, character abilities, and precise shooting mechanics, it revolutionizes the traditional shooter game formula, offering rich strategic options for tactical shooting with endless possibilities in every match. The unique aesthetic of AceForce 2 delivers characters, weapons, maps, and sound effects which quality rivals that of PC gaming.

[Exhilarating Competition & One-Shot Kills ]
In this 5v5 multiplayer PvP shooter game, players enter a fiercely competitive arena where they showcase their shooting skills. Succeeding demands not just quick reflexes but also pinpoint accuracy to swiftly take down foes on a dynamic battlefield, offering an unparalleled sensation of instant kills.

[Strong Teams & Tight Strategies]
In this game, teamwork and strategic planning are paramount. Players must collaborate closely, leveraging their individual skills and strengths to devise smart tactics that collectively challenge their adversaries. Only through solid unity and thoughtful division of tasks can players secure victory in intense team battles and overpower their enemies with unparalleled combat prowess.

[Take Aim and Shoot True]
In this game, precise marksmanship is the ultimate path to dominance. Each character possesses unique skill sets that, when combined with different weapons, result in optimal combat effectiveness. Players must continuously improve their accuracy, identify enemy vulnerabilities, and hit targets accurately. Only with accurate and flawless shooting can one become the ace on the battlefield.

[Intense Firefights & Slick Combat]
Gunfights reign supreme in this game, requiring players to demonstrate advanced marksmanship and elegant combat techniques. By skillfully using terrain and swiftly reacting to enemy attacks, players can exhibit graceful dance-like movements. Maintaining composure and elegance amidst the chaotic barrage of bullets is crucial to gaining the upper hand on the battlefield and becoming an unparalleled marksman.

name: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Fushigi no Dungeon
description:
Kidou Senshi Gundam: Fushigi no Dungeon is a game released on April 19, 2004 for i-mode mobile phones. It was developed by Chunsoft and provided by Bandai Networks.

As the title indicates, this system applies the roguelike mechanics of Chunsoft's flagship game "Mystery Dungeon" to the mobile suits from Bandai's flagship series, "Mobile Suit Gundam."

The player controls the Gundam and fights the Zeon army's mobile suits. There are 14 stages from Side 7 to A Baoa Qu.

name: Sooty's Revenge
description: Enter "Sooty's Rest," the forbidden forest where the legendary fire prevention mascot, Sooty The Bear, is real. Use your compass, flashlight, and survival skills to escape his pursuit. Navigate, hide, and outsmart Sooty in this thrilling wilderness survival horror game. Can you make it out alive?

name: Super Mario Kart Xtreme
description:
This is a bit more gory than the usual Super Mario game, but it is still family-friendly despite that.
Play as Mario or Luigi and kill enemies with your Kart. Use the Cursor Up and Down keys (Arrow keys) to move your Kart. Speed up by using the Right Arrow key, and stop by using the Left Arrow key. Press the "A" key to use the Nitro Boost.

name: Negi Sho-gi: Negi Massigura

name: Prodigy Racing
description: Prodigy Racing is a mouse-operated 3D racing game. It is the third game in Yoichi Hayashi's Prodigy series. In this futuristic racer, players can choose from a selection of five tracks and two game modes. Pilots operate a machine equipped with an anti-gravity engine and race through a high-speed thrill of up to 400 km/h.

name: TinyRogue
description:
You must brave the depths of the dungeon and defeat the boss, only then can you exit and emerge victorious. Tiny Rogue is a minimalist rogue-like dungeon crawler set among randomly generated mazes, with multiple classes to choose from (each with their own abilities) to brave the depths against increasingly powerful monsters.

The MicroPython (PicoDisplayPack and Thumby) versions of the game have been created to be moddable by users of the game. Source code for the Pico-8 and MicroPython is also included.

Ascii mode can be switched on in the settings menu.

name: Fushigi no Dungeon: Fuurai no Shiren Mega

name: Super World Stadium '99
description: Super World Stadium '99 (スーパーワールドスタジアム'99, literally: Sūpā Wārudo Sutajiamu '99), is a baseball arcade game that was released by Namco in 1999 only in Japan; it runs on Namco System 12 hardware and is the twelfth entry in the company's long-running World Stadium series. It is also the fifth entry in the series that does not use a Yamaha YM-2151 FM sound chip for music (as with its four immediate predecessors, it uses a C352 custom sound chip for everything) and the second title in the series which features three-dimensional polygonal graphics (as well as non-identical-looking players).

name: Do You Really Want To Know?
description:
Open your social media app and start your daily life.

This is an interactive fiction jointly launched by Gamtropy and Taiwan AIDS Society (LOVE my VOICE)

Do You Really Want to Know? is a role-playing game that simulates a social media app. Overprotective parents, dysfunctional workplaces, and friends with hidden agendas - all the pressures and events could be opportunities to reexamine each other's relationships. Post updates, send messages, and make choices. Can you maintain the relationships you want if you reveal your true self?

name: Do You Really Want To Know 2: Before Love
description:
Before Love

A text adventure game co-created by Gamtropy and the Taiwan AIDS Society - LOVE the VOICE.

"Do You Really Want to Know 2: Before Love" is a role-playing game that simulates social media interactions. This game is a prequel to the previous game "Do You Really Want to Know?" and it tells the story from the perspective of the character "Nick."

A sudden change disrupts what was once a peaceful life. Adapt to the situation, try to find your footing, and embrace who you are. But can family, friends, and lovers accept the new Nick?

Post updates, send messages, make choices. If you reveal your true self, can you still maintain the relationships you want?
